pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.7: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpessanti, yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharissanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.9: Amhākaṃ pana sakiṃ katāni santhatāni pañcapi chapi vassāni honti, yesaṃ no dārakā uhadantipi ummihantipi undūrehipi khajjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.10: Ime pana samaṇā sakyaputtiyā anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpenti, yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.12: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.13: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.14: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpessanti, yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharissanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū te anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.17: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpenti, yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.21: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpessanti, yācanabahulā viññattibahulā viharissanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.24: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.25: “Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.26: Orena ce channaṃ vassānaṃ taṃ santhataṃ vissajjetvā vā avissajjetvā vā aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:1.27: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosambiyaṃ gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.2: Ñātakā tassa bhikkhuno santike dūtaṃ pāhesuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.8: ‘navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabban’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.9: Ahañcamhi gilāno, na sakkomi santhataṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.10: Mayhañca vinā santhatā na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.13: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.16: Tena gilānena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.24: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno na sakkoti santhataṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.26: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa bhikkhuno santhatasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.29: Ayaṃ itthannāmo bhikkhu gilāno na sakkoti santhataṃ ādāya pakkamituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.32: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa bhikkhuno santhatasammutiyā dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.37: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.38: “Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā santhataṃ kārāpetvā chabbassāni dhāretabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:2.39: Orena ce channaṃ vassānaṃ taṃ santhataṃ vissajjetvā vā avissajjetvā vā aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpeyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.16: ṭhapetvā bhikkhusammutiṃ aññaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.18: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.21: “idaṃ me, bhante, santhataṃ ūnakachabbassāni kārāpitaṃ, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.26: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.27: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.28: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.29: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np14:3.35: vitānaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā sāṇipākāraṃ vā bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karoti,
